TB: Spiked control (Blank hair sample + standard): last cm, assuming little endogenous cort: how much is recovered?

- let sit for 30-60 min, mixing gently.
- let spiked hair dry completely. 
- extract cort normally (add methanol)
TC: Solvent-only control (cort in methanol, no hair)
